data.title: Panot and Kritichanya set the pace at the 4th JAT-NB3 Elite Series.
data.description: Panot Sukanant from Bangkok and Kritchanya Kaopattanasakul from Chonburi kicked off the fourth stop of the JAT-NB3 Elite Series with impressive performances.

data.title: ONE Championship: 22 Fighters pass the scales, Ready to battle
data.description: Fans from around the world will be treated to some serious action as ONE Fight Night 26 airs live from Lumpinee Boxing Stadium (Rama Intra) in primetime in the United States. Which is the morning of 08.00 on Saturday, December 7

data.title: Tourists flock to Phu Kradueng as all of Loei experiences cold weather
data.description: Sudden surge in visitors during extended weekend leads to shortage of porters

data.title: Chinese suspect arrested in Bangkok over trafficking of sedative
data.description: The arrest of the ‘mastermind’ follows a drug bust in Guangdong province, as authorities continue working on dismantling the ring linked to trafficking etomidate

data.title: Thai banks highlight headwinds in Laos as economy slows
data.description: Interest rate hike and tough business conditions are affecting Thai investment and financing in the neighbouring country, bankers say

data.title: Beachfront New Year feast sparkles at CASA MARE
data.description: Set against the stunning backdrop of Regent Beach, this gala evening promises a culinary journey featuring an extensive international buffet. Guests can savour everything from authentic Thai favourites at the Somtum & Yum Zap station to fresh selections at the sushi bar and Thai-style Izakaya seafood barbecue. A dedicated pasta station and an array of decadent desserts round out the gastronomic offerings.

data.title: Celebrate a sustainable and giving festive season
data.description: Novotel Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport invites you to experience a festive season filled with sustainability, local traditions, and heartfelt giving. From eco-friendly decorations and unique workshops to a taste of Thai cuisine and a commitment to giving back, the hotel has curated an exceptional celebration for guests of all ages.

data.title: Celebrate the season with Royal Porcelain’s stylish tableware
data.description: Festive feasts are more than just food—they’re moments to cherish with loved ones, where every detail counts, from delicious bites to the perfect table setting. Whether it’s bite-sized smoked salmon dill canapés or a refreshing bowl of som tam paired with your favourite wine, the festive season is all about bringing people together. And for tableware that delights the eyes as much as the taste buds, Royal Porcelain has unveiled a refreshed retail shop concept and exciting twists to its collections.

data.title: Moxy Bangkok unleashes playful art with ‘Fun Hunters’
data.description: Prepare for a bold, colourful celebration of creativity with ‘Fun Hunters of Bangkok,’ as Moxy Bangkok Ratchaprasong transforms into a dynamic art space this December. Featuring exclusive works by acclaimed street artists HAI HAI TOON, BONUS TMC, and TOON KAEWKERD, alongside emerging local talents, this event captures Bangkok’s lively spirit and artistic energy.

data.title: Guru's Weekly Buzz: Dec 6-12
data.description: Guru By Bangkok Post

data.title: Thai-m to toast 2025 at Blue Elephant
data.description: Picture yourself on New Year’s Eve, free from the chaos of last-minute grocery shopping and kitchen stress. Instead, you’re seated in a magnificent century-old colonial mansion, where crystal chandeliers cast a warm glow over polished teak floors, and the air is filled with the aromatic promise of an extraordinary meal to come. This is Blue Elephant Sathorn, where Master Chef Nooror Somany Steppe is preparing to orchestrate your final feast of 2024.

data.title: Sergei Nakariakov joins RBSO for an unmissable concert
data.description: The Royal Bangkok Symphony Orchestra Foundation, in collaboration with B.Grimm Group Ltd., will present a concert titled “Sergei Nakariakov plays Arutunian’s Trumpet Concerto” at 7:30 pm on Saturday, 14 December 2024 at the Thailand Cultural Centre. This concert will begin with Dr. Vanich Potavanich’s Symphonic poem “Rattanakosin (R.E. 146-237),” which aims to describe significant events of King Rama IX that occurred during R.E. 146-137 of the Rattanakosin period. A number of melodic motives are drawn from impactful national compositions, including King Rama IX’s Candlelight Blue, the Thai national anthem, Thai Royal Barge song, and Vijit Jitrangsan’s Rattanakosin (R.E. 1-145). Dr. Vanich Potavanich is the resident conductor of the RBSO and was awarded by the Ministry of Culture the 2024 Silpathorn Artist Awards.

data.title: Celebrate Christmas with exquisite hampers from Centara Grand at CentralWorld
data.description: As the festive season approaches, embrace the spirit of joy and giving with Centara Grand at CentralWorld’s exquisite Christmas hampers. Thoughtfully curated, these hampers are perfect for friends, family, and business associates, making every gift a cherished gesture of appreciation.

data.title: Unwrap magical moments at Sofitel this festive season
data.description: As the joyous festive season approaches, Sofitel Bangkok Sukhumvit invites you and your loved ones to immerse yourselves in a world of elegance, culinary excellence, and unforgettable experiences. This Christmas and New Year, let the magic unfold with carefully curated celebrations that promise to leave lasting memories.

data.title: The rise of digital currencies in Southeast Asia: How cryptocurrency exchanges are driving adoption
data.description: Southeast Asia sits quietly in the midst of a tsunami of change with digital currencies. Exchanges are the epicenter of this change. Cryptocurrency exchange forms the arteries and the veins for the masses to be active participants in the new financial world.

data.title: Discover Chiang Rai’s rich culture, cuisine at ‘Colours of Doi Tung’
data.description: Running until January 26, the festival celebrates the success of the Doi Tung Development Project with art, local handicrafts and northern delicacies

data.title: TDRI offers govt advice on restructuring taxes without hurting poor
data.description: In response to the finance minister’s proposal, the institute advises increasing VAT slowly, refining personal income tax rates and reducing BOI benefits

data.title: BYD bucks the trend as Thailand’s auto sales slide
data.description: Industry leaders seek government support to revive the sector and stimulate demand in 2025, as sales drop sharply this year
